content: The microphone ran out of battery during Tuesday's lecture. I re-recorded the lecture and the new recording is linked under that week's content (C without the ++ (0b01)) as the recording.
The 2nd chance exams for exams 1 and 2 will now be on Thursday the week after the exam, instead of Tuesday. Exam 3's 2nd chance exam will be on a Wednesday instead of Tuesday.
